name: Bugbear Chief
description: A strong humanoid with a muscular build, capable of dealing substantial melee damage.
memorable: Combines brute strength with tactical cunning, making it a dangerous opponent.
goals: Seeks to lead and surprise enemies, using ambush tactics.
relations: Often leads other bugbears; may command lesser goblinoids.
environment: Typically found in forests or caves where they can ambush travelers.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity, capable of significant damage and stealthy movement.
weaknesses: Average intelligence and charisma may hinder social interactions.
attacks: Melee attacks with a maul, dealing substantial damage; also uses javelins for ranged combat.
most_powerful_ability: Move Out allows for strategic repositioning of allies without provoking attacks.
senses: Has a passive perception of 15, enabling it to detect hidden enemies.
skills: Proficient in athletics and stealth, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
additional_information: Can deal increased damage to surprised foes.
Uses tactical maneuvers to reposition allies in battle.
